About

关于我

手淫互联网，意淫大数据

大家好，我是小马哥，Java 劝退师，Apache Dubbo PPMC、Spring Cloud Alibaba 项目架构师。目前主要负责集团中间件开源项目、微服务技术实施、架构衍进、基础设施构建等。通过 SUN Java（SCJP、SCWCD、SCBCD）以及 Oracle OCA 等的认证。

Hard Code in Internet，Think Big Data too much

Hi, I’m Mercy Ma, as a member in Apache Dubbo PPMC, an achitecture of Spring Cloud Alibaba, and working on Open Source projects and Micro Services infrastructure, certificated SUN Java（SCJP、SCWCD、SCBCD）, Oracle OCA and so on.
